text: THE next White Paper on defence, to be published in March, is likely to contain a five-year plan for the three Services. Its aim will be to produce superbly equipped, all-Regular forces of about 400,o00 men. The three Services would be "integrated" to a greater extent than ever before.
handwritten_text: THE next White Paper on defence, to be published in March, is likely to contain a five-year plan for the three Services. Its aim will be to produce superbly equipped, all-Regular forces of about 400,o00 men. The three Services would be "integrated" to a greater extent than ever before.
